nodeList.loreText: Those who have seen past the darkness have been driven to madness or death.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Summon a powerful black hole at target location that aggressively pulls enemies and deals high damage.

nodeList.description: Black Hole deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Black Hole pulls enemies a shorter distance towards itself.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [15%] Increased damage and reduced pull strength per point.

node.description:
Back Hole’s base cold damage is converted to fire damage. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to cold damage.

Black Hole lasts much longer, but no longer pulls enemies.
node.nodeDescription: No longer pulls enemies.\n\nConverts base cold damage to fire.

node.nodeDescription: Summon a powerful black hole at target location that aggressively pulls enemies and deals high damage.

node.description: Black Hole creates an explosion when it ends that pushes all enemies back, but has a shorter duration (multiplicative with other modifiers). The explosion makes a wave of energy that deals 15 cold damage and has a freeze rate of 30.
node.nodeDescription: Duration reduced by half. On finish explodes pushing back all enemies and releases a wave of energy that deals 15 cold damage and has a freeze rate of 30.

nodeList.description: Black Hole has a chance to create another Black Hole once it expires. This second Black Hole is half as effective and cannot create another.
